title: runtime: sweeping an incache span
body:
This isn't supposed to happen.  Got it with GOARCH=386 ./all.bash

fatal error: sweep of incache span

goroutine 41 [running]:
runtime.throw(0x8344b3a)
	/usr/local/google/home/khr/sandbox/go-movestack2/src/pkg/runtime/panic.c:463 +0x68 fp=0x185c92b4
runtime.sweepone()
	/usr/local/google/home/khr/sandbox/go-movestack2/src/pkg/runtime/mgc0.c:1943 +0xdf fp=0x185c92d4
